name: Advanced_Machines
title: Advanced Machines
author: DWolf0_0
description:
Adds many advanced versions of machines sutch as the
Electric Furnace,
Crafting Machine, 
Processing Plant,
Oil Refinery,
Beacon,
And also MK4 and MK5 Modules including a God Module
The God Module has the perks of all Modules and it can be MK1-5.
